content.question: Matrices <math alttext="A"><mi>A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B"><mi>B</mi></math> are given by <math alttext="A equals a 1 by 3 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 1, row 1 column 2 value 7, row 1 column 3 value negative 2"><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="B equals a 3 by 1 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 3, row 2 column 1 value 1, row 3 column 1 value 4"><mi>B</mi><mo>=</mo><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>. Which of the following is the product <math alttext="A B"><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="a 1 by 1 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 2"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="a 1 by 3 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 3, row 1 column 2 value 7, row 1 column 3 value negative 8"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="a 3 by 1 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 3, row 2 column 1 value 7, row 3 column 1 value negative 8"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="a 3 by 3 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 3,row 1 column 2 value 21, row 1 column 3 value negative 6, row 2 column 1 value 1, row 2 column 2 value 7, row 2 column 3 value negative 2, row 3 column 1 value 4, row 3 column 2 value 28, row 3 column 3 value negative 8"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>21</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>1</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>7</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>4</mn></mtd><mtd><mn>28</mn></mtd><mtd><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="a 1 by 1 matrix with row 1 column 1 value 2"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>2</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
